Welcome

The show must go on.

Arcade is a unique, all-day food theatre bringing London’s top food and drink concepts together under one roof. Our current line-up features Pophams, Casita Do Frango, Chotto by Chotto Matte, Flat Iron Workshop, Lina Stores, Le Bab, Pastorcito and TŌU – and we're on the look out for fresh talent
